message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe I can offer you $85 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $95. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny.
Alice, I understand your position. I would like to offer $87 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still a bit hesitant to sell it to you for that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $92?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $88 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $91?
Alice, I value your product and appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to offer $89 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't reach an agreement. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think I've reached my limit. How about $90?
Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $89.50 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
